#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int power(int i,int j)
{
    int m=1;
    int c=j;
    while(c>0)
    {
        m=m*i;
        c--;
    }
    return(m);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {int a, b;
    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;
    int p;
    if(b==0)
        {
            cout<<1<<endl;
            return(0);
        }
    int k=a%10;
    //cout<<"k="<<k<<endl;
    int c=1;
    int i=2;
    int j;
    while(1)
    {

        p=power(k,i);
        //cout<<"p="<<p<<endl;
        if(p%10==k)
        {
            break;
        }
        else
        {
            c++;
            i++;
        }
    }
        //cout<<"c="<<c<<endl;
        if(c==1)
        {
            cout<<k<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            int m=b%c;
            if(m==0)
            {
                p=(power(a,c));
                cout<<p%10<<endl;
            }
            else
            {
                p=(power(a,m));
                cout<<p%10<<endl;
            }
        }
    }

    return(0);
}
